::Hunter::

"Ugh.." groans Hunter as he gets to his feet in the forest around 
what would one day be known as London, England, "Slagging Predacons."

He looks around, his scanners working hard to detect any threats. All 
the bots were near some base in the area. He sighs. Attacking bases 
singlehandedly wasn't recommended for anyone who wished to live for 
any extended period of time. Not that Hunter wanted to live for too 
long (he didn't), but he didn't want to die before he accomplished 
his goal.

Hunter powers up his jetpack, flying up into the air. He picks a 
random direction and flies off, heading southeast.
